title: Amelia Lost: The Life and Disappearance of Amelia Earhart
description: In alternating chapters, Fleming moves readers back and forth between Amelia's life (from childhood up until her last flight) and the exhaustive search for her and her missing plane. With photos, maps, and handwritten notes from Amelia herselfâ€”plus informative sidebars tackling everything from the history of flight to what Amelia liked to eat while flying (tomato soup).
author: Candace Fleming
